titleStmt.title: The observator reproved more especially in relation to the controversie between that eminently pious, charitable, and worthy divine Mr. Smithye, curate of Cripplegate, and himself.
titleStmt.author: Philo Pater.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and published by Langley Curtis,

notesStmt.note: In response to L'Estrange, Sir Roger. The observator, a publication printed several times a week.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
